name: Tic-Tac-Toe (CadaCreate)
description:
Using the MASM in Visual Studio and Irvine32 Library as a reference I coded tic-tac-toe. The idea is to create a grid using ASCII characters, the program would ask the player to pick a number between 1 and 10 to determine whether the player would go first or not. If the player went first he would be X or vice versa.

The console would then print out the grid and display ‘-’ in the spots where X/O would go, when selecting the destination of your next mark the player would choose a location from 1-9.
Two different modes are included, Mode 1 would be two users facing off against each other. Mode 2 would be one user versus the computer.
